meanings.definition: A tropical American tree bearing edible fruit.
meanings.sent1: The cashaws on the tree looked ripe and ready to eat.
meanings.sent2: I picked some fresh cashaws from the tree for a snack.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to steal the cashaws from the tree.
meanings.sent4: The cashaws on the tree were like colorful jewels in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of the cashaws filled the air around the tree.

meanings.definition: The fruit of the cashaw tree.
meanings.sent1: She made a delicious smoothie using cashaws as the main ingredient.
meanings.sent2: The market was selling fresh cashaws from the local orchard.
meanings.sent3: The kids had a fun time playing catch with the cashaws.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as bright and joyful as the taste of cashaws.
meanings.sent5: The cashaws were so juicy that they dripped down her chin as she ate them.

meanings.definition: The nut of the cashaw tree.
meanings.sent1: Cracking open the cashaws revealed the tasty nuts inside.
meanings.sent2: He used crushed cashaws to add flavor to his baking.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel buried the cashaws to save them for later.
meanings.sent4: The cashaws were like little treasures waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The crunch of the cashaws added a satisfying texture to the dish.
